sentences.en: ...ambient sounds of children in the background.
sentences.cn: ...背景处环绕着孩子们的声音。

sentences.en: Ambient concentrations varied considerably by season.
sentences.cn: 环境浓度随季节而大幅度变化.

sentences.en: Ambient noise may come from any direction.
sentences.cn: 外界噪声可以来自任意方向.

sentences.en: Ambient temperatures should not exceed 113 ℃ when equipment is powered.
sentences.cn: 当产品在工作过程中,周围的环境温度不能超过113℃.

sentences.en: Another ambient temperature sensor is the vapor - filled bellows.
sentences.cn: 另一种空气温度传感器是充气波纹管.

sentences.en: Bone conduction microphones enable headsets to effectively eliminate the ambient noise.
sentences.cn: 骨传导麦克风能有效地消除环境噪音.

sentences.en: Coolant temperature and ambient air pressure may be used to optimize cold starting and altitude performance.
sentences.cn: 冷却水温度和大气压力可用于使冷起动性能和高原性能最优化.

sentences.en: Free from the influence of ambient temperature, it is stable and reliable.
sentences.cn: 不受环境温度影响, 稳定可靠.

sentences.en: It is very important for crush barrier to influence on ambient environment.
sentences.cn: 桥梁的防撞护栏对周边环境的影响格外重要.

sentences.en: Such parameters as ambient oxidizer concentration, temperature level, and fuel identity are held constant.
sentences.cn: 周围氧化剂浓度 、 温度量级 、 燃料性质参数是保持恒定的.

sentences.en: Swelling and porosity of the propellant mixture became evident after 6 days at ambient temperature.
sentences.cn: 在室温下将药柱放置6天后,推进剂呈现膨胀和气孔.

sentences.en: Terms such as ambient conditions or room temperature should be avoided.
sentences.cn: 应避免使用诸如外部环境或室内温度的用语.

sentences.en: The film formation of ambient drying water - dispersing coatings is described.
sentences.cn: 叙述了常温成膜水分散涂料的成膜.

sentences.en: The music in this area is ambient, however, the enemies are tough.
sentences.cn: 这里的音乐很平淡, 但敌人很强.

sentences.en: Their music mixes industrial noise, ambient and black metal.
sentences.cn: 他们的音乐混合着工业噪音 、 氛围音乐和黑金属.

sentences.en: Vibration alert for use in areas of high ambient noise.
sentences.cn: 振动告警用于高噪音环境场合.

phrases.tran_cn: 环境空气质量；环境空气品质
环境温度；室温；周围温度

trans.tran_cn: 周围的，包围着的，产生轻松氛围的，环境
trans.tran_en: relating to the surrounding area; on all sides
